code: import React,{Fragment,useState}from'react';import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{toast}from'react-toastify';import'./Register.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Register=_ref=>{let{setAuth}=_ref;const[inputs,setInputs]=useState({email:"",password:"",name:""});const{email,password,name}=inputs;const onChange=e=>{setInputs({...inputs,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const onSubmitForm=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const body={email,password,name};const response=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/auth/register",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(body)});const parseRes=await response.json();if(parseRes.jwtToken){localStorage.setItem("token",parseRes.jwtToken);setAuth(true);toast.success("Registered Successfully");}else{setAuth(false);toast.error(parseRes);}}catch(err){console.error(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"register-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"register-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center my-5",children:"Register"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:onSubmitForm,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",placeholder:"email",className:"form-control my-3",value:email,onChange:e=>onChange(e)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",name:"password",placeholder:"password",className:"form-control my-3",value:password,onChange:e=>onChange(e)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"name",className:"form-control my-3",value:name,onChange:e=>onChange(e)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success btn-block",children:"Submit"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",className:"link",children:"Login"})]})})});};export default Register;
